mn136:2.7: mā hevaṃ, āvuso potaliputta, avaca → idaṃ vākyaṃ syā1-3, kaṃ potthakesu
mn136:2.9: Atthi ca kho → atthi ceva kho (mr)
mn136:2.12: nāma evaṃnavo bhikkhu → nāmevaṃ navo bhikkhu (bj) | navakena bhikkhunā (mr)
mn136:6.5: ummaṅgaṃ → ummaggaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | umaṅgaṃ (mr)
mn136:6.13: byākaramāno → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3, km, pts1 potthakesu
mn136:9.8: micchā tesaṃ ñāṇan’ti → micchā te sañjānanti (mr)
